channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- USG FLEX H series uOS firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- USG FLEX H series uOS firmware

item.title: CVE-2024-9677|2024-10-22T15:52:56.281Z -- zyxel -- usg%20flex%20h%20series%20uos%20firmware
item.description: The insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability in the CLI command of the USG FLEX H series uOS firmware version V1.21 and earlier versions could allow an authenticated local attacker to gain privilege escalation by stealing the authentication token of a login administrator. Note that this attack could be successful only if the administrator has not logged out.

item.title: CVE-2024-9677|2024-10-22T01:19:53.188Z -- zyxel -- usg%20flex%20h%20series%20uos%20firmware
item.description: The insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability in the CLI command of the USG FLEX H series uOS firmware version V1.21 and earlier versions could allow an authenticated local attacker to gain privilege escalation by stealing the authentication token of a login administrator. Note that this attack could be successful only if the administrator has not logged out.
